crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiSerialCom
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiSerialCom
crown.desc: Module to provide SerialCom functionality. Multiple instances can be created and will run in multiple threads on the device. + This module provides a UI for all relevant features. + {empty} + Typically the features of this module are used like this (check also main script of this module): + {empty} + **1) Setup** + - If multiple instances are needed, these can be added via 'addInstance()' (not needed if you only use 1 single instace). + - Set instance to configure via 'setSelectedInstance' + - Make use of the 'set...' functions to configure the SerialCom interface. Make sure to select a valid interface via 'setInterface'. + - Via 'setActive' it is possible to activate the SerialCom port. + {empty} + INFO: With every change of the setup parameters it will reopen the connection if it was active. + {empty} + **2) Interaction** + Other modules can register on these events / trigger these functions: + {empty} + - 'OnNewDataNUM (see docu) + - 'receiveInstanceNUM' (see docu) + - 'transmitInstanceNUM' (see docu) +

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Event to provide list of created instances.

event.name: OnNewProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: objectNo

param.desc: If parameter is for specifici internal used object, its number.
param.name: internalObjectNo

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify if new instance is selected.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewDataNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide received data of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewData1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

param.desc: The timestamp in microseconds at which the first bytes of the frame were received.
param.name: timeOfReceive

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewValueUpdateNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to sync paramters between instance threads and Controller part of module. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1"). +

param.desc: Instance new value is coming from.
param.name: instance

param.desc: Name of the paramter to update/sync.
param.name: parameter

param.desc: Optionally if internal parameter should be used for internal objects.
param.name: selectedObject

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to forward data from instance thread to Controller part of module, e.g. to forward values to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1"). +

param.desc: Eventname to use to forward value.
param.name: eventname

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredEvent
event.desc: Notify event instance is registered to receive data to process.

event.name: OnNewStatusConnected
event.desc: Notify if selected serial communication is connected.

event.name: OnNewStatusAvailableInterfaces
event.desc: Notify available serial communication interfaces.

event.name: OnNewStatusCommunicationActive
event.desc: Notify if communicaiton is configurated as active.

event.name: OnNewStatusType
event.desc: Notify type of serial communication.

event.name: OnNewStatusBaudrate
event.desc: Notify baudrate.

event.name: OnNewStatusFrameRxStart
event.desc: Notify framing for RxStart.

event.name: OnNewStatusFrameRxStop
event.desc: Notify framing for RxStop.

event.name: OnNewStatusFrameTxStart
event.desc: Notify framing for TxStart.

event.name: OnNewStatusFrameTxStop
event.desc: Notify framing for TxStop.

event.name: OnNewStatusBufferSizeRx
event.desc: Notify buffer size of receive frame.

event.name: OnNewStatusBufferSizeTx
event.desc: Notify buffer size of transmit frame.

event.name: OnNewStatusParity
event.desc: Notify parity of serial communication.

event.name: OnNewStatusHandshake
event.desc: Notify if handshake is used.

event.name: OnNewStatusReceiveQueueSize
event.desc: Notify queue size of internal receive function.

event.name: OnNewStatusDiscardIfFull
event.desc: Notify if newest (TRUE) or oldest (FALSE) item should be discarded if queue size of receive function is too big.

event.name: OnNewStatusWarnOverruns
event.desc: Notify if warnings are active on overruns of the receive function.

event.name: OnNewStatusDataBits
event.desc: Notify number of data bits.

event.name: OnNewStatusFlowControl
event.desc: Notify if flow control is active.

event.name: OnNewStatusStopBits
event.desc: Notify amount of stop bits.

event.name: OnNewStatusTermination
event.desc: Notfiy if internal termination is used.

event.name: OnNewStatusTempDataToSend
event.desc: Notify temporary set data to transmit.

event.name: OnNewStatusLog
event.desc: Notify log of current selected instance communication.

event.name: OnNewStatusInterface
event.desc: Notify used serial communication interface.

event.name: OnNewStatusReceiveTimeout
event.desc: Notify timeout to wait for received data.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/ device boot up.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: setSelectedInstance
function.desc: Select one of the multiple instances.

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get the amount of created instances of this module.

function.name: setRegisterEvent
function.desc: Configure event that this module should listen to. If this one is notified, it will transmit the attached data of the event via serial interface. + (Will be set to currently active instance, see "setSelectedObject")

function.name: transmitInstanceNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to transmit data. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "transmitInstance1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".

return.desc: Number of bytes transmitted; 0 if transmit failed.
return.name: sendBytes

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: setInterface
function.desc: Function to set interface to use for SerialCom.

function.name: setActive
function.desc: Function to set if serial communication should be active.

function.name: setType
function.desc: Function to set type of serial communication.

function.name: setBaudrate
function.desc: Function to set baudrate.

function.name: setFramingRxStart
function.desc: Function to set frame of RxStart.

function.name: setFramingRxStop
function.desc: Function to set frame of RxStop.

function.name: setFramingTxStart
function.desc: Function to set frame of TxStart.

function.name: setFramingTxStop
function.desc: Function to set frame of TxStop.

function.name: setFramingBufferSizeRx
function.desc: Function to set maximum size of a packet which can be parsed by the received framing.

function.name: setFramingBufferSizeTx
function.desc: Function to set maximum size of a packet which can be parsed by the transmitted framing.

function.name: setParity
function.desc: Function to set parity of serial communication.

function.name: setHandshake
function.desc: Function to set if handshake is active.

function.name: setReceiveQueueSize
function.desc: Function so set size of internal queue size for the receive function.

function.name: setDiscardIfFull
function.desc: Function to configure handling of received items.

param.desc: Set to TRUE to discard the newest item which is currently added instead of discarding the oldest element.
param.name: status

function.name: setWarnOnOverruns
function.desc: Function to set if warning on overruns should be used for the receive function.

param.desc: Set to false to disable warning on overruns when using the receive()-function.
param.name: status

function.name: setDataBits
function.desc: Function to set data bits.

function.name: setFlowControl
function.desc: Function to set flow control.

function.name: setStopBits
function.desc: Function to set stop bits.

function.name: setTermination
function.desc: Function to set status of internal termination.

function.name: setTempDataToSend
function.desc: Function to set temporary data to send via 'trasnitDataViaUI'.

function.name: transmitDataViaUI
function.desc: Function to transmit temporary set data (see 'setTempDataToSend').

function.name: setReceiveTimeout
function.desc: Function to set timeout for received data.

function.name: receive
function.desc: Function to trigger receive function of currently selected instance.

function.name: receiveInstanceNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to trigger receive function of instance.. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "receiveInstance1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".
